name: Born Together
description:
Two Entities find themselves trapped inside a mysterious facility. Though completely separate, they find a strange connection between their rooms. They'll have to work together if they ever want to escape.

Creators Note - 

We are two brothers, and is our first attempt at a game jam! Please leave a comment, we would love to hear your feedback!

https://www.justindpnt.com
